Cocokind Turmeric Vegan Facial Mask Stick

Brand: Cocokind

Category: Mask

Ingredients: CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL*, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED WAX, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL*, POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID, CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) ROOT POWDER*, ZINGIBER OFFICINALE (GINGER) ROOT POWDER*, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA T

ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL*

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
